welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dendermonde, a charming city known for its historical buildings and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
